titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation for the better ordering the transportation of clothes, and other vvoollen manufactures into Germany, and the Low-Countreys.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most excellent Maiestie,
